A treatise of the iudge of controuersies. Written in Latin, by the R. Father Martinus Becanus of the Society of Iesus, Professour in Diuinity. And Englished by W.W. Gent De judice controversiarum. English Becanus, Martinus, 1563-1624. Wright, William, 1563-1639.
[8], 170, [4] p.
English College Press] Permissu superiorum, [Saint-Omer : M.DC.XIX. [1619]
W.W. = William Wright. Translation of: De judice controversiarum. Printer's name from STC. With two final contents leaves. Running title reads: Of the iudge of controuersies. reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 170, [4] p.
English College Press] Permissu superiorum, [Saint-Omer : M.DC.XIX. [1619]
W.W. = William Wright. Translation of: De judice controversiarum. Printer's name from STC. With two final contents leaves. Running title reads: Of the iudge of controuersies. reproduction of the original in the British Library.
